name: Rogue DIES on the DICE
description:
Rogue DIES on the DICE is a casual rogue-like game which player tries to survive on the dice from the randomly generated enemy per each roll. Made for GMTK JAM.

This game is my first game jam project and I was not able to finish it as I didn't have enough time. (I started way too late in the weekend) I will try finish it after the game jam as I want it to be finished game. I'm just uploading it to participate the game jam for the first time.  Currently nothing much you can do with it though, please give it a shot if you want :)
